definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Mesmer (name)/Franz Anton Mesmer (1734-1815), Austrian doctor who introduced hypnosis

sentences.english: What about the fortifications at Verdun and Metz?
sentences.chinese: 那凡尔登与梅斯的防御工事呢？

sentences.english: Krisztian Nemeth today completed a loan switch to Championship side Blackpool.
sentences.chinese: 内梅斯今天完成了租借至英冠球队布莱克浦的转会。

sentences.english: Some presidents, though, didn't always follow Mesnier's advice.
sentences.chinese: 不过，有些总统也并不全听从梅斯尼尔的建议。

sentences.english: What say you to it, once again, brother Dimmesdale!
sentences.chinese: 你再说一遍吧，丁梅斯代尔兄弟，你对此看法如何？

sentences.english: Novels such as Lazarillo de Tormes were influential across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 托梅斯的导盲犬等小说的影响遍布了整个欧洲。

sentences.english: "What wouldst thou say, child?" asked Mr. Dimmesdale.
sentences.chinese: “你要说什么啊，孩子？”丁梅斯代尔先生问道。

sentences.english: I think President Mays put it even better.
sentences.chinese: 我认为梅斯院长把它阐述得更好。

sentences.english: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character.
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

sentences.english: The decision to leave Kimberly with Mr. Mays rendered her suit debated.
sentences.chinese: 把金伯莉判给梅斯先生的决定使此案引起了争议。

sentences.english: The paper is a critical analysis of Dimmesdale, the hero in Hawthorne's The Scarlet Letter.
sentences.chinese: 霍桑《红字》中的丁梅斯德是一个极其复杂的人物。

sentences.english: Tony hobnobbed with an attractive widow when he lived in Metz.
sentences.chinese: 托尼在梅斯居住期间曾与一名漂亮的寡妇交往甚密。

sentences.english: Mezcal is the most ancient distilled spirit in America.
sentences.chinese: 梅斯卡尔是美国最古老的蒸馏酒。

sentences.english: Pious Master Dimmesdale! can this be you?
sentences.chinese: 虔诚的丁梅斯代尔牧师，难道当真是你吗？

sentences.english: They hook up a Maes learning module into Mickey's code.
sentences.chinese: 他们把一个梅斯式的学习模块装载在米奇的编码里。

sentences.english: Maston courageously menaced them with his steel hook.
sentences.chinese: 梅斯顿勇敢地用他那可怕的铁钩子威胁它们。

sentences.english: Mayes said the babies were beingcared for in intensive care in Belfast.
sentences.chinese: 梅斯说，婴儿们正在贝尔法斯特受到出格护理。

definition: Marseille, city in south France/Basay, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
Stuttgart city in southwest Germany and capital of Baden-Württemberg 巴登·符騰堡州|巴登·符腾堡州[Ba1 deng1 · Fu2 teng2 bao3 zhou1]
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
